intent_atoms.description: Aggregate per-severity ParseIssueStore metrics for UI and CLI ribbons to support tolerant parsing dashboards and streaming summaries.
ParseIssueStore aggregation must expose per-severity counts for tolerant parsing dashboards and streaming summaries.
Design deliverables in DOCS/AI/ISOInspector_Execution_Guide/04_TODO_Workplan.md must confirm ribbon layout requirements before downstream UI wiring proceeds.
VoiceOver regression pass for accessibility shortcuts on macOS and iPadOS hardware to ensure focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets.
Hardware verification on macOS and iPadOS must confirm focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets.
VoiceOver regression pass is blocked until required hardware is available.
Secure Dolby Vision, AV1 etc. real‑world asset fixtures to shift regression baselines from synthetic payloads once licensing approvals are obtained.

functional_units.name: ParseIssueStore Aggregation API
functional_units.description: Provides per-severity issue counts for tolerant parsing dashboards and streaming summaries

functional_units.name: UI Ribbon Integration for Parse Issue Metrics
functional_units.description: Exposes parsed issue metrics in SwiftUI ribbons according to design specifications

functional_units.name: CLI Ribbon Integration for Parse Issue Metrics
functional_units.description: Displays parsed issue metrics in command-line interface ribbons

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Accessibility Verification Workflow
functional_units.description: Hardware verification process ensuring focus commands announce controls and restore focus targets on macOS and iPadOS

functional_units.name: Real-World Asset Licensing Management
functional_units.description: Process to secure licensing for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures for regression baselines
